overview: The carefree life of a young boy named Luca was transformed into chaos in a matter of minutes by an unjustly invaded war. Though he has escaped the cruelty that has overtaken him, the war has managed to leave an indelible scar on his life - every day he is haunted by the horror he has endured. But no sooner does he emerge from his past ordeal than new ones come his way, forcing him to resort to extreme measures so that he can finally step confidently into a brighter future.
title: With Love, Luca
